columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the namespace.

columns.name: zone_redundant
columns.description: Enabling this property creates a Premium Service Bus Namespace in regions supported availability zones.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time the namespace was created.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: This property disables SAS authentication for the Service Bus namespace.

columns.name: metric_id
columns.description: The identifier for Azure insights metrics.

columns.name: servicebus_endpoint
columns.description: Specifies the endpoint used to perform Service Bus operations.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: The specified messaging units for the tier. For Premium tier, capacity are 1,2 and 4.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of this SKU. Valid valuer are: 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The billing tier of this particular SKU. Valid values are: 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the namespace.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The time the namespace was updated.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the servicebus namespace.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: Specifies the properties of BYOK encryption configuration. Customer-managed key encryption at rest (Bring Your Own Key) is only available on Premium namespaces.

columns.name: network_rule_set
columns.description: Describes the network rule set for specified namespace. The ServiceBus Namespace must be Premium in order to attach a ServiceBus Namespace Network Rule Set.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: The private endpoint connections of the namespace.

columns.name: authorization_rules
columns.description: The authorization rules for a namespace.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
